title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When I click the SaveAs icon next to the Save Icon, a dialog comes up. After browsing for a valid container location, I type the filename but ignore the extension. Then I click Ok.
EB: After clicking Ok, the Navigator should add the file in the specified location with the correct file extension.
SR: 1) Open an existing java file.2) Make some modifications to the file.3) Click the SaveAs icon next to the Save Icon.4) A dialog will appear. Browse for a valid container location.5) Type the filename including the desired file extension.6) Click Ok. Check the Navigator to confirm that the file is added with the correct file extension.
